casebody.data:
Second Department,

February, 1950.

(February 2, 1950.) Ralph Sasson, Respondent, v. Leo Lichtman, Appellant.

Present — Carswell, Acting P. J., Adel, Sneed, Wenzel and MaeCrate, JJ. Motion for resettlement or for reargument denied, without costs. Present — Adel, Sneed, Wenzel and MaeCrate, JJ. Nolan, P. J., not voting. [See ante, p. 932.]
